channel.title: How do I make a no-hamachi IP?
channel.description: I know you have to go to no-ip.org, but I have know Idea how to do it, and make my server a no-Ip without hamachi. Can anyone help with step by step instructions?

item.title: How do I make a no-hamachi IP?
item.dc:creator: @Text .Text
item.description:
@Text wrote:

  1. Go to www.no-ip.com
  2. register a account for a no-ip adress
  3. accept the email sent to you for registration.
  4. login with the user and pass u made.
  5. on the side it will say YOUR NO-IP
  6. right under that it says hosts/redirects
  7. click on add
  8. once u clik add fill in the information with what ur server name is…what you want as the end of the no-ip. (.org, . biz, .info etc…)
  9. and it will say your server has been added to our hosting list
  10. then compile and run your server
  11. then post your server on server status page
  12. you log with “localhost” or “127.0.0.0” and have fun

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a no-hamachi IP?
